author: samisa
msg: Added some fixes related to transport and message context

author: prestonf
msg: The current transport/channels cannot handle a SOAP message whose http header in which neither a chunked or message length is defined.
If the message is not chunked or a message length given, then 'Connection: close' must be specified.  In this case, the message is ended when the server closes the connection.
Correction to code and header file as had syntax errors.

author: evenisse
msg: [SCM-146] Allow to run mkview without -vws parameter

msg: Updates to AJAX exampes to make them work on IE 6
